name: NORTH AMERICAN SECURITIES ADMINISTRATORS ASSOCIATION
sampleDescriptions: Investor protection, capital markets policy, preservation of state authority to regulate the business of securities.
Advocated on behalf of policies to enhance investor protection for investors, with emphasis on retail investors and elderly investors, as well as issues that implicated state securities regulators or
